Fantastic food!  Get the salad plates. Itâ€™s $7 (edit, now $11) per person and you need to take the platter that comes with laffa but totally do it. Also, onion rings were memorably good!  Fries were fine and shish kabab was ok. Two years later and this time I got the schwarma which was also OK.  Dinner for 2 was $100 and service was EXCELLENT!  They even moved a second table for 2 over to us when main course was served because we had too many little salad plates. Looking forward to going back.
Beautiful relaxed place and ambiance!! Absolutely love their delicious food!! They really care about their customers! Thank you so much!!

I REALLY recommend this place, because of The food and The really nice service ! (And so generous)
5â­ï¸

We came on the recommendation of a friend and we were very pleased.

Ambience is casual, clean, no frills and plenty of seating. Watching the worker make the breads from scratch as you come in is a nice touch.

Staff was very friendly and courteous and took the time to explain all the different dishes.

The freshly-made laffa was a really nice treat - especially in an era when restaurants cut back on the "fresh bread basket" starter that was common only a short while ago.

For starters we ordered the Appetizer Combo which included Falafel, Moroccan cigars, Chicken (egg)roll & Kibbeh. All were 10/10, although the falafel could have used a bit more of the cilantro and other seasoning you would expect in a falafel .

Although this is a Middle-Eastern joint, and we should have gone for their specialty dishes (shawarma, kebobs, etc.) we went with burgers, schnitzel, and all the sides. The burgers hit the spot, although we would have wanted thicker patties. And the schnitzel was the best we have ever had: thin, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside; fried to perfection. 10/10!

We will definitely be going back to try the Middle-Eastern dishes.

First time here. Looked up yemenite soup.
Soup was delicious though not much potatoes or meat inside. My son got the chicken wings. I gotta say they should have let the chickens grow a bit more. Almost zero meat

This is ridiculous. 18 percent mandatory tip charge for party of ONE

What an amazing experience!!!
From start to finish this place is amazing.
Food is magnificent.
Customer service is amazing.
The place is full completely and still they made the time and paid exalent attention to us and our needs

From start to finish, I had an absolutely wonderful experience. The food was exceptional, and the service was truly top-notch.

What really stood out to me was our server, Rosi. He was not only friendly and professional but also incredibly attentive without being overbearing. From the moment we were seated, Rosi made sure we felt welcomed and comfortable. He offered excellent recommendations and made sure our glasses were never empty. His positive energy and genuine care for our experience took our evening from great to unforgettable. If youâ€™re lucky enough to have Rosi as your server. Youâ€™re in for an extra-special treat!

The atmosphere is warm and friendly. The food is a very good value for your money.

I highly recommend!

BEST FOOD EVER!!  The shawarma is delicious!!!! Tastes like Israel ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡± in every bite!!!! I love the atmosphere so vibey and fun!!! I met the owner they are the sweetest people to exist!! Come eat your meal here todayyyyyyyy ğŸ©µğŸ’™ğŸ©µğŸ’™

We really enjoyed eating here. It was our first time but we probably overordered.  The steaks were delicious and the Schwarma was tasty. The service was quick and efficient. They even upsold my kids on a dessert.
This place is excellent. I got a Falafel laffa. You tell them what toppings you want on it and watch them make it. It was absolutely delicious! Highly recommend!

Olympia Steak House is a fantastic spot for a flavorful and satisfying meal. Their lafa is warm, soft, and perfect for wrapping around their juicy baby chicken, which is always seasoned just right and cooked to perfection. The variety of fresh salads they serve alongside the meal adds a refreshing balance, and everything comes together beautifully on the plate.

Their French fries are also a standoutâ€”crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside, and served in generous portions. Whether youâ€™re dining in or taking out, Olympia delivers a delicious and well-rounded experience every time. Itâ€™s one of those places you find yourself wanting to go back to again and again.

It's a very nice place to eat but the name steakhouse is simply not fit for this store it's more like a fast food store including the prices we ate a full meal we ordered again in the middle of our meal and it was still $70 per person what is very cheap for a steakhouse try again this place is not a steakhouse the food was good it was decent but it wasn't steakhouse style.
The atmosphere was a little outdated.
In shorts to sum it up it's a fast food store that offers dine in and waiter services

Highly recommend!

Great food and great service

Came at closing and they took care of me
This place is amazing. Everytime we come as group to celebrate someone's birthday, they welcome us with open arms. Food is great and plenty!
We made a party service was great. Food was amazing.

Slow service, took a while to get the burger and was overcooked. Ordered a 2nd, didn't charge extra for it. Vegetable soup was in a large bowl and tasted delicious. They serve this thin airy bread as a appetizer.
Back room is open for more space and private events.

The prices are very high!  Very much!  I will attach photos and prices!  You are overlooked.  Okay, it would be acceptable to taste, but no.  It is impossible to chew meat at all!
In order now.  Burger worth 16 !!!!!  Dollars!  A slice of pita and 5 small pieces of meat.  Everything.  No sauce, no cheese.  It's just bread and just a little meat!  McDonald's puts more in Big Mac.  And the taste is much better.
Further buffalo wings (12pc) is indicated on the website.  You get five pieces for $ 12.  That's horrible.
Well, absolutely empty shawarma.  The meat is overcooked.  Bread is simply impossible to chew.  And I am silent about the bones in the meat.  Disgusting food for a lot of money.
-10 stars!
Can't get a better chicken shawarma sandwich! Felix and the cooks and workers are very friendly and the service is great.

Terrible experience. Service is so bad. Waitress did not come to the table even once. Ordered Israeli combination plate got  small  plates of pickles, coleslaw, Tahini sauce and Israeli salad. Joke. Food came in and side orders came 15 minutes after. Non professional place
The food was amazing.   I highly suggest going just for the pita.  And, they do have food for vegetarians.
